meanings.definition: A room in a house or building.
meanings.sent1: I love to relax in the cozy oom.
meanings.sent2: The children played in the bright oom.
meanings.sent3: The cat found a sunny spot in the oom to nap.
meanings.sent4: The oom was filled with laughter and chatter.
meanings.sent5: The oom smelled of fresh flowers and warm cookies.

meanings.definition: A unit of measurement for the amount of space a room occupies.
meanings.sent1: The architect measured the oom of each space carefully.
meanings.sent2: The oom of the living room was larger than expected.
meanings.sent3: The oom of the closet was surprisingly spacious.
meanings.sent4: The oom of the warehouse seemed endless.
meanings.sent5: The oom of the box was just enough for all the items.

meanings.definition: A sound made to express surprise or excitement.
meanings.sent1: She let out a loud oom when she saw the surprise.
meanings.sent2: The audience erupted in cheers and ooms.
meanings.sent3: The oom of joy echoed through the room.
